item.title: Peraso Inc S-1
item.description: Peraso Inc, which is in the Semiconductors & Related Devices [3674] industry, SEC S-1 filing on December 15, 2022 had 10570 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: stock - 246 instances common - 190 instances shares - 171 instances securities - 132 instances company - 118 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
